summary: This document is a property record search certification conducted by Jade Data Research, Inc. for properties in Palm Beach, Florida, related to Jeffrey Epstein and other individuals. It details various deeds, quitclaim deeds, and objections to title concerning the ownership and transfer of property, including significant transactions involving Epstein.

persons.name: Howard Goodman
persons.context: Howard Goodman is mentioned as a record owner in a deed dated 08-26-1985.

persons.name: Rona Goodman
persons.context: Rona Goodman is mentioned as the wife of Howard Goodman in the same deed.

persons.name: Christina M. Glass
persons.context: Christina M. Glass is mentioned as a married woman who received a deed from Howard and Rona Goodman.

persons.name: Herbert I. Glass
persons.context: Herbert I. Glass is mentioned as a divorced man who received a quitclaim deed from Christina M. Glass.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is mentioned as a single man who received a quitclaim deed from Herbert I. Glass.

connections.description: Howard Goodman and Rona Goodman are married, as indicated in the deed.
Howard Goodman transferred property to Christina M. Glass through a deed.
Christina M. Glass transferred property to her ex-husband Herbert I. Glass via a quitclaim deed.
Herbert I. Glass transferred property to Jeffrey Epstein through a quitclaim deed.

events.title: Deed Transfer from Howard and Rona Goodman to Christina M. Glass
events.description: Howard and Rona Goodman transferred property to Christina M. Glass.

events.title: Quitclaim Deed from Christina M. Glass to Herbert I. Glass
events.description: Christina M. Glass transferred property to Herbert I. Glass via a quitclaim deed.

events.title: Quitclaim Deed from Herbert I. Glass to Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: Herbert I. Glass transferred property to Jeffrey Epstein for $2,500,000.

events.title: Quitclaim Deed from Jeffrey Epstein to Laurel, Inc.
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein transferred property to Laurel, Inc. via a quitclaim deed.

keyFacts: The document certifies a search of public records in Palm Beach County, Florida.
Jeffrey Epstein is involved in multiple property transactions, including a significant quitclaim deed for $2,500,000.
The document lists various objections to title related to the properties searched.
There are no open mortgages or judgments found of record against the properties.
The search certification date is noted as 07-17-2019.
